description: Your dream companion awaits! Create your Virtual Girlfriend, shape her look, personality, relationship, and bring her to life in one click. 100% powered by Artificial Intelligence.
title: TingoTingo
introduction: Create your Virtual Girlfriend with AI technology and bring her to life in one click.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial available for new users.

faqs.question: Can I customize my Virtual Girlfriend's appearance?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize her look and personality to your liking.
